name: vdv
description: A Chrome Extension can show the vector drawable when you open it

scripts.clean: find src -name "*.js" -print0|xargs -0 -I{} rm {} && find src -name "*.js.map" -print0|xargs -0 -I{} rm {}
scripts.browserify: [ ! -d bin ] && mkdir bin || node_modules/.bin/browserify src/main.js > bin/main.js
scripts.release: rm -r bin/* && NODE_ENV='production' npm run tsc && npm run browserify; mkdir -p to-be-released/bin; cp manifest.json to-be-released/; cp bin/main.js to-be-released/bin/
